name: Flesh Reaver
description: The Flesh Reaver is a lithe undead creature, with a disjointed and grotesque appearance reflecting its malevolent nature. It possesses sharp claws and a predatory grace, allowing it to leap at its foes unexpectedly.
memorable: Its ability to knock foes prone and consume their flesh while they are incapacitated sets it apart as a particularly lethal adversary.
goals: To hunt down and devour living creatures, employing cunning tactics to exploit the vulnerable.
relations: Often found in the company of other undead or evil creatures, exploiting Pack Tactics to maximize its combat effectiveness.
environment: Usually lurks in graveyards, crypts, or shadowy urban areas where it can ambush unsuspecting prey.
strengths: Immunity to poison, resistance to necrotic damage, and advantageous special abilities like Keen Senses and Pack Tactics enhance its combat capabilities.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma make it vulnerable to mental and social manipulations.
attacks: Uses quick claw strikes to deal slashing damage and can followup with a Consume Flesh attack on prone targets for additional necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Its Leap ability allows it to jump into combat effectively and gain tactical advantage by knocking opponents prone.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its environment without needing sight.
skills: Has a +2 modifier in perception checks due to its keen senses, providing good awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Tactical in nature, utilizing group tactics against foes.
Can close distances quickly with its high movement speed.
Immune to conditions such as charmed, exhaustion, and poisoned.
Can bypass the mental defenses of enemies due to low intelligence.
Inflicts additional necrotic damage when it successfully consumes flesh.
test_queries: undead creature with quick movement and jumping ability
agile reaver that consumes its foes
tactical undead that knocks opponents prone
creature with keen senses and necrotic abilities
